response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and features, it's worth $150 to me, but considering your appreciation for it, I believe we can come to a fair agreement. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120. This price not only reflects its value but also allows us both to benefit. Please let me know if this offer suits you.", "product_price": 120}
